post:
iClickAndHost - Managed and Unmanaged VPSs in USA / UK / AU <> 24/7 live support

Our VPS web hosting packages are a great alternative to our shared hosting packages. They are designed for users, who need a lot more power plus full control and freedom of their online environment on a budget. VPS offers the same degree of freedom as dedicated servers do, but at just a fraction of the price.
At iClickAndHost.com we offer both OpenVZ VPS web hosting and Virtuozzo VPS web hosting at prices starting at just $16.99/month.

  • Choice of Datacenter Location - choose between USA, UK or Australia - only Tier 3 and Tier 4 facilities!
    [*]Unlimited Domains Hosted - host as many websites as you need on your VPS!
    [*]Choice of Control Panel - cPanel, our custom-built Hepsia or DirectAdmin
    [*]Guaranteed CPU - your VPS will be able to use 100% of the CPU speed (an SLA agreement);
    [*]No SWAP Partitioning - your VPS will be able to use 100% of the server memory;
    [*]Real RAM Quotas - you will get increased cache levels and a much faster server;
    [*]NO HDDs - Only SSD storage not affected by the high IO operations of other VPSs;
    [*]NO Slow Backups - up to 5-10 times faster backups, with no impact on the speed of your VPS;
    [*]Easy Speed Upgrades - you can easily switch to faster CPU speeds (up to 7 GHz);
    [*]Easy RAM Upgrades - you can easily upgrade to 2 GB/5 GB RAM.
    [*]Web Accelerator Tools - InnoDB, Varnish, Node.js and Memcached available to activate at no extra cost from the Control Panel

With each package you also get :

  • UNLIMITED Domains
  • UNLIMITED Emails
  • UNLIMITED Databases
  • UNLIMITED FTP Accounts
  • FAST Account Activation
  • NO Setup Fees
  • 24/7/365 Support
  • WEEKLY Off-site Backups
  • SSH/ FULL Root Access
  • OS Choices (CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu)
  • CONTROL PANEL Choices (Hepsia, cPanel, DirectAdmin)
